05 Feb 2025

What’s the story behind the story? What inspired you to write The Stone Monkey (The Adventures of Wu Kong Volume 1)?

This is a classic adventure story and I wanted to make a good graphic novel on this.

What’s your favorite genre to read? Is it the same as your favorite genre to write?

Adventure.

If you could choose one thing for readers to remember after reading your book, what would it be?

I hope readers can find their ways to get through the complexity of this world.
